location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.423 of 1820 from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement from Warden of the receipt of Bruce's dispatches dated 2 February 1820, with its copies of dispatches from Major General Sir William Grant Keir regarding correspondence with Rama Ben Jabar. Warden writes that the Honourable Governor in Council approves of proceedings.
